description: A blast at a chemical factory launched a metal plate that hit an apartment block, officials say.
title: Spanish chemical plant explosion kills man 3km away
title_page: Spanish chemical plant explosion kills man 3km away - BBC News
maintext: The factory produces chemicals such as ethylene oxide - which can be used to make antifreeze, pesticides and to sterilise hospital equipment - and propylene oxide, which is used to make plastics. Both are extremely flammable.
